author: Reuters Editorial
title: Garanti Bankasi Signs Syndicated Loan Agreement Worth $457 Million, EUR 670.5 Million And $145 Million
text:
May 3 (Reuters) - TURKIYE GARANTI BANKASI AS:
* SIGNS A SYNDICATED LOAN AGREEMENT IN THE AMOUNT OF $457 MILLION, EUR 670.5 MILLION AND $145 MILLION
* LOAN TO BE USED FOR TRADE FINANCE AND GENERAL CORPORATE PURPOSES
* ALL-IN COST HAS BEEN REALIZED AS LIBOR+1.30%, EURIBOR+1.20% AND LIBOR+2.10% RESPECTIVELY Source text for Eikon: (Gdynia Newsroom)
Our
